articles.author: Hunter Moyler
articles.title: Televangelist Sells $125 'Silver Solution' as Cure for Coronavirus
articles.description: The product contains chemicals known by the state of California to be dangerous, according to Bakker's website.
articles.content:
A guest on televangelist Jim Bakker's show suggested on Wednesday that a product sold on Bakker's website might be effective at protecting against and killing the novel coronavirus.
The guest, naturopathic Dr. Sherrill Sellman, said that Silver Solutiona pro… [+3920 chars]

articles.author: Dan Cancian
articles.title: Formula 1 Postpones Chinese Grand Prix Because of Coronavirus Outbreak
articles.description: The race was scheduled for April 19 in Shanghai but has been called off—and may not be held at all this year.
articles.content:
The outbreak of coronavirus that has caused havoc in China has now forced the postponement of the Chinese Formula 1 Grand Prix.
The race was scheduled to be the fourth stage of the 2020 season and set to be held in Shanghai on April 19.
On Wednesday, F1 man… [+3182 chars]

articles.author: Kashmira Gander
articles.title: How Does Coronavirus Spread and How Contagious Is It? Everything We Know So Far
articles.description: The virus which has killed over a 1,000 people is thought to have jumped from animals to humans.
articles.content: Since a new coronavirus started sickening people in the central Chinese city of Wuhan late last year, it has killed over 1,000 people, with all but two in China. As the bug named COVID-19 is new, experts are still learning about its natureincluding how it is … [+6019 chars]

articles.author: Brendan Cole
articles.title: Coronavirus Panic After Woman Recently In China Coughs and Vomits at Party—Doctors Say She Was Only Drunk
articles.description: Local reports say that the woman had been in Shanghai, and started coughing at a bar in the northern city of Valladolid.
articles.content:
A woman health officials feared was displaying coronavirus symptoms at a party has been discharged from hospital after she was found to just be intoxicated.
Staff at a bar in the northern Spanish city of Valladolid called emergency services when the woman be… [+2170 chars]

articles.author: Jason Murdock
articles.title: China's Coronavirus App Uses Mass Surveillance to Tell Citizens If They Could Be Infected
articles.description: The mobile application is reportedly being fed data collected by China's vast monitoring apparatus, which is known to retain large amounts of personal information on citizens.
articles.content:
China has released an app that lets users check if they have been in contact with a person confirmed or suspected having a coronavirus infection.
As the death toll of the deadly outbreak tops 1,100, health authorities in the country have rolled out mobile so… [+4233 chars]

articles.title: What Happens to Your Body When You Get the New Coronavirus?
articles.description: The little-understood virus has killed over 1,000 people since it emerged late last year.
articles.content:
Over 1,000 people have died and 45,000 have fallen ill with the new coronavirus, which emerged in a Chinese city late last year. So, what exactly happens to your body when you catch the little-understood bugwhich has been named COVID-19?
